snippet: A newborn son’s death helped deepen Rick Santorum’s opposition to abortion, and he became an outspoken social conservative.
abstract: Man in the News profile of Republican presidential candidate Rick Santorum, who became a deeply religious and outspoken social conservative following death of his newborn son; his weaving of religion and politics helped him in his close finish to Mitt Romney in the Iowa caucuses.
lead_paragraph: A newborn son’s death helped deepen Rick Santorum’s opposition to abortion, and he became an outspoken social conservative.

headline.main: After a Child’s Death, a Religious Politician Became a Cultural Warrior
